issue.title: [Go] Support JSON reader/writer
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9630](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9630). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Any plan to support JSON reader and/or writer in Go implementation? I would like that like [CSV R/W\|#third-party-data-formats]]

 

[arrjson](https://github.com/apache/arrow/tree/master/go/arrow/internal/arrjson) package seems to support it but it's an internal.
